Languages: Understand the languages of its creator but cannot speak

Traits.Name: Sewage Trail
Traits.Content: The Waste Golem leaves a trail of toxic waste in its wake. Any creature that starts its turn in this trail must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Traits.Name: Shapeless Form
Traits.Content: The Waste Golem can squeeze through tight spaces as if it were one size smaller.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If the creature fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Waste Golem makes two attacks: one with its Slam and one with its Contaminated Slam.

Actions.Name: Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Actions.Name: Contaminated Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature and is already poisoned, it takes an additional 9 (2d8) necrotic damage and must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become blinded until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Toxic Surge
Actions.Content: The Waste Golem releases a wave of toxic waste in a 15-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The area becomes difficult terrain until the end of the golem's next turn.

LegendaryActions.Name: Primary Attack
LegendaryActions.Content: The Waste Golem makes one attack with its Slam.

LegendaryActions.Name: Toxic Shield (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Waste Golem surrounds itself with a mist of corrosive waste. All creatures within 5 feet of it must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

LegendaryActions.Name: Regenerate (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Waste Golem regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points as it absorbs waste from the environment.
